name: To Crime Nirvana
description:
A city was once ruled in peaceful tyranny by the criminal, King Crimeson, after he attained enlightenment. After his arrest, he's decided to set other people toward the path of Crime Nirvana, sparking new turf wars. Former Crimeson member Ryuki, his occultist boyfriend Kat and their actual cat Salem don't like the nonsense his declaration caused and decide to deal with the gangs themselves.

This game is a collaboration between scitydreamer (me) and GRASSHOPPERMASK. 

Features:

  • A simple RPG that can be completed in under an hour!
  • Bosses that can be fought in any order - this is a boss game!
  • Battles where status ailments/debuffs work reasonably!
  • Gameboy-game based aesthetics!
  • Soundtrack made up of stuff by Monplaisir Loyalty Freak Music!
